timeline.author: matejvasek

timeline.message:
feat: Funqy HTTP binding handles "/" URI

If there is explicitly exported single method (by config),
or if there is exactly one method annotated with @Funq,
then the method is mapped to "/" URI.

Signed-off-by: Matej Vasek <mvasek@redhat.com>
